text: And he shall make a firm covenant with many for one week: and in the midst of the week he shall cause the sacrifice and the oblation to cease; and upon the wing of abominations <FI>shall come<Fi> one that maketh desolate; and even unto the full end, and that determined, shall <FI>wrath<Fi> be poured out upon the desolate.
name: Daniel 9:27
